response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with our premium product, which is truly a game-changer in its field. It offers unparalleled benefits and value, making it an investment worth $1,000,000. Considering its immense worth to you, I am extending this exclusive opportunity to acquire it at a special introductory price of $950,000. This offer is designed to ensure you receive the best possible value while securing your position as a distinguished owner of this remarkable product. Please let me know if you would like to proceed with this exceptional deal.", "product_price": 950000}
